Package org.eclipse.ecf.presence

Interface Summary
IAccountManager Presence account management.
IChatID Adapter interface for chatIDs.
IMessageListener Listener for text IM messages.
IMessageSender Interface for sending text messages (IM) between users.
IParticipantListener Super interface receiving participant presence messages.
IPresence Presence information for a user.
IPresenceContainerAdapter Entry poing presence container adapter.
IPresenceListener Listener for receiving and processing presence and roster update events.
IPresenceSender Send presence change events to remotes on buddy list.
IRosterEntry Roster entry object.
IRosterGroup Roster group information.
IRosterSubscribeListener Listener for handling notifications of subscribe/unsubscribe requests.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPresenceContainer An abstract IPresenceContainerAdapter implementation.
IMessageListener.Type Inner class describing Type of message received
IPresence.Mode A type-safe enum class to represent the presence mode information
IPresence.Type A type-safe enum class to represent the presence type information
IRosterEntry.InterestType  
Presence Base presence class implementing IPresence.
RosterEntry Roster entry base class implementing IRosterEntry.
RosterGroup Base roster group class implementing IRosterGroup.
